data.text:
@AngharadHafod Wales Covid mentioned on Death Certificate

2020           4,945
2021            4,231
2022                455

Total Welsh Covid Deaths to February 18th 2022

9,631 as per Government Dashboard https://t.co/R2dElwI33x

@AngharadHafod If it is on a death certificate it had a hand in killing the person.
Real example
14 year old boy
Caught Covid which caused blood clots which caused a stroke which caused a cerebral haemorrhage.
Covid went on line 2 https://t.co/PnzpBmL1La

See screenshot from PHW dashboard for local authorities. See @Lowri_Williams' https://t.co/s8C2na3YIW for more local figures.
4/4 https://t.co/0FEVxSRoE5

Positivity also seems to be having a bit of a wobble. R by publication date has risen above 1 for the first time in around a month, though this might be a blip. It still might have something to do with Storm Friday (which is now on the wrong side of the equation).
3/4 https://t.co/SZv8leopxE

Cases are slightly down today (808), but not enough to make up for the rise over the 3 days reported yesterday. I am a bit concerned that the fall might have stalled.
2/4 https://t.co/MPbINthDKv
